def sabb(s, value, happiness):
      return "Sabbatical! Boom!" if sum([sum(1 for i in s if i in "sabbatical"), value, happiness]) > 22 else "Back to your desk, boy."

from collections import Counter

def sabb(s, value, happiness):
    cnt = Counter(s.lower())
    return ("Back to your desk, boy.", "Sabbatical! Boom!")[sum(cnt[a] for a in set('sabbatical')) + value + happiness > 22]

from collections import Counter

def sabb(s, value, happiness):
    C = Counter(s.lower())
    score = value + happiness + sum(C[c] for c in set("sabbatical"))
    return "Sabbatical! Boom!" if score > 22 else "Back to your desk, boy."

def sabb(s, value, happiness):
    return 'Sabbatical! Boom!' if sum(1 for x in s if x.lower() in 'sabbatical') + value + happiness > 22 else 'Back to your desk, boy.'
